name: yanaframework/yanaframework
description: A powerful framework for PHP that allows you to create applications faster using low-code, in-memory database simulation during development, supports a wide range of DBMS, low-code and code generators and and modular, evolutionary prototypes that grow and adapt as your requirements change.

suggest.pear-pear.php.net/SQL_Parser: Allows you to test SQL statements 'offline' against Yana's in-memory database simulation. It still works without it, but you will have to use the query builder.
suggest.doctrine/dbal: To connect to a number of common database systems
suggest.pear-pear.php.net/MDB2: This is an alternative 'database abstraction layer' (DBAL) that provides support for more database systems than Doctrine-DBAL, including some 'exotic' options.
suggest.pear-pear.php.net/MDB2_Driver_mysqli: To connect to MySQL and Maria-DB
suggest.pear-pear.php.net/MDB2_Driver_odbc: To connect to more DBMS like IBM DB2 aso via ODBC
